description: Copilot is a tool designed to enhance user experience on Windows 10 devices by providing proactive assistance and effectively managing device rollouts. It offers a guided rollout strategy for both managed and unmanaged devices, tailored for the Windows 10 version 22H2. With Copilot, IT administrators can streamline device management processes and ensure a seamless integration of new features within organizational infrastructures. This tool helps in optimizing IT operations by simplifying the deployment of system updates and managing user interactions. Documentation and further resources can likely be found on the official Microsoft Tech Community site.
